decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the single storey rear extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the single storey side infill extension hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 4 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (NVBL_003_0.0_EXISTING FRONT ELEVATION, NVBL_003_0.0_EXISTING REAR ELEVATION, NVBL_003_0.0_EXISTING REAR SIDE ELEVATION, NVBL_003_0.0_EXISTING SECTION EE, NVBL_003_0.1_EXISTING GROUND FLOOR PLAN, NVBL_003_PROPOSED SECTION BB_Rear, NVBL_003_PROPOSED SECTION FF, Existing Location Plan. Received: 18/05/2015. NVBL_003_Proposed Rear Elevation, NVBL_003_Proposed Side Elevation. Received: 19/08/2015. NVBL_003_PROPOSED FRONT ELEVATION_2 Rev. D, NVBL_003_PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN FRONT EXTENSION_2 Rev. D, NVBL_003_PROPOSED SECTION AA AND SECTION BB_2 Rev. D. Received: 10/11/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Joint application for the erection of single storey side infill extensions to number 3 and 5 and erection of a single storey rear extensions with a green roof with replacement of timber access stairs at the rear garden to number 5
